{{also|變化|变化}}
==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|へん|か|yomi=o}}
{{compound|変|lang=ja|tr1=[[hen]]|t1=to [[change]]|化|sort=へんか|tr2=[[ka]]|t2=to change into}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|へんか|acc=a|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=ko}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|へんか|kyu=變化|hhira=へんくわ}}

# change in [[society]], [[climate]], or [[condition]], [[transformation]], [[variety]]
# [[variation]]
# [[declension]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|変化球}} (''henkakyū''): (''baseball'') ball with a change of speed
* {{l|ja|変化形}} (''henkakei''): variation
* {{l|ja|格変化}} (''kakuhenka''): (''linguistics'') declension; change of case
* {{l|ja|大変化}} (''daihenka''): major change
* {{l|ja|音変化}} (''onpenka''): change in sound
* {{l|ja|相変化型光ディスク}} (''sōhenka-gatahikeri-disuku''): (''computing'') phase change optical disk
* {{l|ja|緯度変化}} (''ido henka''): latitude variation
* {{l|ja|化学変化}} (''kagaku henka''): chemical change
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|可逆変化}} (''kagyaku henka''): reversible change
* {{l|ja|環境変化}} (''kankyō henka''): environmental change
* {{l|ja|経年変化}} (''keinen henka''): change over the years
* {{l|ja|構造変化}} (''kōzō henka''): structural change
* {{l|ja|語形変化}} (''gokei henka''): (''linguistics'') inflection of words
* {{l|ja|語尾変化}} (''gobi henka''): inflection
* {{l|ja|状態変化}} (''jōtai henka''): (''computing'') state change
* {{l|ja|非ゼロ復帰変化記録}} (''hizero-fukki-henka-kiroku''): non-return-to-zero recording
{{bottom}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|へんか|kyu=變化}}

# to [[change]], to [[vary]]
#: {{ja-usex|気候が変化した。|きこう が '''へんか'''した。|The climate has changed.}}
